item.description: Introduction My current obsession is Origami and Origamizake is the digital product of it. It is all about folding Origami in 3D with the future goal of making it audio-reactive. Take a look here: https://georgiee.github.io/origami/ Just fun for me. See my LOG.MD for my current mood ðŸŽŽ Running example Open in new window play
